I'll venture a guess that you don't really understand what an optimal rotation means. Most likely wherever you saw what you think you know actually quoted one of my post on EJ.

The dps that the items are rated by is not a dps of any single rotation. It is a dps of the overall solution, taking into account a mix of cycles, mana management and cooldown stacking. You can see that in the spell cycles tooltip in the Solution section. That dps is optimal in a very well defined way. It has its limitations, but they're far less trivial than what you seem to suggest.

ABSpam4MBAM is the highest dps cycle (with 2T10), but it is not the only optimal cycle. In presence of mana management the optimal solution will almost always be combination of two cycles (in a simplified scenario without cooldowns you'll have exactly two cycles, but it gets more complicated once you add cooldown stacking). The main reason why it's suggesting ABspam034MBAM is because that allows you to use less evocation (and in practice allows you to fish for missile barrage more). Besides, the theorycrafting at EJ isn't exactly exclusive to best in slot gear. If you want to fully understand how Rawr works you'll want to check some info there. You don't need to read everything, but since you say you've done your own theorycrafting before you might be interested in some of the posts I've made on the topic of computing optimal cycles.
